nodes.text: A flight pack allowed a user to fly using a combination of fuel, oxygen, and wings. They were used by the ExGal-4 scientists Bendodi Ballow-Reese, Jerem Cadmir, Luther De'Ono, and Tee-ubo Doole in 26 ABY on Belkadan to help them travel while investigating the storm created by Yomin Carr's dweebits.
